one_reviews_text: This game is terrible if uve played any VR game at all. all actions require u to turn ur head and look at the items and the game has a hot bar but u cannot utilize it u have to manually change items to ur first slot to use it. completly sucks
do not play it it dosent start
You dont even get to use your controllers.

review_title: The GREATEST experiance of my life
one_reviews_text: This game is just the best thing humanity has ever produced. I played 150 hours on this masterpiece, and not ONCE have i got mad. this game is recommended to ALL HUMAN BEINGS , especially if you HATE bears. 100/10 would recommend a friend. i want to kiss the developer
Get regular minecraft for normal screens. The distance you can see, even with it turned up to max, is about the minimum you can set it with a regular screen. It completely ruins the game.

review_title: Looks ok, but no supported controllers.
one_reviews_text:
How do you even play a game without controllers?
Get some support for the Oculus Touch controllers, maybe I can actually play this game, not just look around the menu screen.
Refuses to start, waste of money
